homepage.subtitle: Solve two interlocking word puzzles on a 5×5 grid.
homepage.description: Fill each row and column with valid 5-letter words. Every letter must work for both its row AND column word.

help.title: How To Play
help.subtitle: Solve two interlocking word puzzles on a 5×5 grid.

rules.fillGrid: Fill each row and column with valid 5-letter words.
rules.letterWorks: Every letter must work for both its row AND column word.
rules.toggleMode: Toggle between Row and Column mode to submit words.

help.yellow: Yellow — In both the row and column word, but wrong spot.
help.cyan: Cyan — In the row word only, but wrong spot.
help.pink: Pink — In the column word only, but wrong spot.
help.panelsDescription: The panels around the grid track your knowledge:
help.leftRightPanels: Left/Right panels — Misplaced and absent letters for each row.
help.topBottomPanels: Top/Bottom panels — Misplaced and absent letters for each column.
